cyclone.name: ISAIAS
cyclone.current_location: about 100 miles ESE of Jacksonville, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: moving north then north-northeast parallel to the southeast U.S. coastline, forecast to make landfall in the Carolinas and ride up the U.S. East Coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the northeast South Carolina / southeast North Carolina coast (around Surf City, NC area)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Tropical Storm Watch begins north of Watch Hill RI to Stonington ME, not on the Gulf coast
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning from Flagler/Volusia County Line FL northward along Atlantic coast to west of Watch Hill RI; Hurricane Warning South Santee River SC to Surf City NC; none for Gulf coast
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Atlantic coast from central Florida northward through New England; Gulf coast (including Tampa) largely unaffected
weather_observation.wind: Only breezy, occasional gusts below tropical-storm force expected; no sustained gales forecast
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected on the west-central Florida (Tampa) coast
weather_observation.rainfall: Periods of showers possible; heavy tropical rainfall core remains on Atlantic side
weather_observation.other_hazards: Minor coastal rip-current risk on Gulf beaches
